summary: I apologize, but there's no actual conversation text provided in your message. Without seeing the specific conversation details, I can't generate a meaningful title. Could you share the conversation text you'd like me to summarize?

message.content: can you debug my app i can barley see the text in the login back and i cant click it but i can press tab and go to it. if i type after every letter it reset . use playwright

content.text: I'll help you debug the login app issues using Playwright. Let me first examine your app structure and then create automated tests to identify the problems.

todos.content: Examine the app structure and identify login components

todos.activeForm: Creating tests to debug input reset behavior

todos.activeForm: Running tests and analyzing results
